TopicTitle: Anyone want to play DMP and record ? ( ksp multiplayer )

Articles.Content:
Does anyone want to perform a multiplayer game of ksp with me ?

If you want to consider playing with me , here are the specifications .

Age 13 - 16 ( just so it's not awkward )

Youtube channel with more than 20 subscribers

Skype/Raidcall/Teamspeak

The ability to host a server or the knowledge of a good lag-free server with few people online ( because loading in ships causes major loading lag )

If you can meet these specifications , please communicate with me so we can work this out .
